summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3780 for the improvement of the alley in block 6, University Park Addition, being the alley between 15th Avenue Northeast and 16th Avenue Northeast, from East 50th Street to East 52nd Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46579, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
